description: Returns information about an Identity Resolution Job in a specific domain. Identity Resolution Jobs are set up using the Amazon Connect admin console. For more information, see Use Identity Resolution to consolidate similar profiles.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Identity Resolution Job.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Identity Resolution Job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the Identity Resolution Job.
PENDING: The Identity Resolution Job is scheduled but has not started yet. If you turn off the Identity Resolution feature in your domain, jobs in the PENDING state are deleted.
PREPROCESSING: The Identity Resolution Job is loading your data.
FIND_MATCHING: The Identity Resolution Job is using the machine learning model to identify profiles that belong to the same matching group.
MERGING: The Identity Resolution Job is merging duplicate profiles.
COMPLETED: The Identity Resolution Job completed successfully.
PARTIAL_SUCCESS: There's a system error and not all of the data is merged. The Identity Resolution Job writes a message indicating the source of the problem.
FAILED: The Identity Resolution Job did not merge any data. It writes a message indicating the source of the problem.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The error messages that are generated when the Identity Resolution Job runs.

nested_items.name: JobStartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Identity Resolution Job was started or will be started.

nested_items.name: JobEndTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Identity Resolution Job was completed.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Identity Resolution Job was most recently edited.

nested_items.name: JobExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Identity Resolution Job will expire.

nested_items.name: AutoMerging
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for how to perform the auto-merging of profiles.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: The flag that enables the auto-merging of duplicate profiles.

nested_items.name: Consolidation
nested_items.description: A list of matching attributes that represent matching criteria. If two profiles meet at least one of the requirements in the matching attributes list, they will be merged.

nested_items.name: MatchingAttributesList
nested_items.description: A list of matching criteria.
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConflictResolution
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles. For example, if Profile A and Profile B have the same FirstName and LastName (and that is the matching criteria), which EmailAddress should be used?

nested_items.name: ConflictResolvingModel
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles.
RECENCY: Uses the data that was most recently updated.

SOURCE: Uses the data from a specific source. For example, if a company has been aquired or two departments have merged, data from the specified source is used. If two duplicate profiles are from the same source, then RECENCY is used again.

nested_items.name: SourceName
nested_items.description: The ObjectType name that is used to resolve profile merging conflicts when choosing SOURCE as the ConflictResolvingModel.

nested_items.name: MinAllowedConfidenceScoreForMerging
nested_items.description: A number between 0 and 1 that represents the minimum confidence score required for profiles within a matching group to be merged during the auto-merge process. A higher score means higher similarity required to merge profiles.

nested_items.name: ExportingLocation
nested_items.description: The S3 location where the Identity Resolution Job writes result files.

nested_items.name: S3Exporting
nested_items.description: Information about the S3 location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket name where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3KeyName
nested_items.description: The S3 key name of the location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: NumberOfProfilesReviewed
nested_items.description: The number of profiles reviewed.

nested_items.name: NumberOfMatchesFound
nested_items.description: The number of matches found.

nested_items.name: NumberOfMergesDone
nested_items.description: The number of merges completed.
